item1.name: Egg Simple
item1.description: One (1) egg your way with American cheese in a delicious wrap.

item2.name: Garden Wrap
item2.description: Two (2) scrambled eggs, American cheese, tomatoes, sautéed mushrooms, green onions and baby spinach in a wrap.

item3.name: Market Wrap *
item3.description: Two (2) scrambled eggs, Cheddar cheese, sausage patty, green onions, peppers and sautéed mushrooms in a wrap.

item4.name: Southwest Wrap
item4.description: Two (2) scrambled eggs, Pepper Jack cheese, black bean & corn relish, salsa & green onions in a wrap.

item5.name: Flat Wrap Benny w/Hash *
item5.description: Two (2) poached eggs, Hollandaise sauce & our own corned beef hash in a wrap.

item6.name: Corned Beef Hash w/Eggs & Cheese *
item6.description: Two (2) fried eggs, our own corned beef hash, cheese in a wrap.
